# About me

Hi, I'm Mahdi Mirzadeh. I was born in Fall 2003 and live in Iran. I love computer-related stuff and spend a lot of time learning about them. I'm deeply interested in Free and Open Source Software (FOSS) and have used GNU/Linux as my daily driver since 2018.

## Interests

- Free and Open Source Software (FOSS)
- GNU/Linux, shells, and minimal tooling
- Simple, text-first workflows and dependency-free software

## What I build

- Small, fast tools and websites with minimal dependencies
- This website is built with Kaveh, a pure POSIX shell static site generator

## This website

- Markdown turned into semantic HTML with per-directory headers/footers
- Built-in responsive dark mode and RSS feed
- RSS: [blog.xml](/blog.xml)

## Contact

- Email: [mahdi@mirzadeh.pro](mailto:mahdi@mirzadeh.pro)
- Prefer plain text. For encrypted mail, see the [contact page](/contact.html).
- PGP fingerprint: `6619 D598 7FF3 01B9 8604  3FD9 867D 890E AC1C 4063`

## Support

If you'd like to support my work, visit the [donate page](/donate.html).
